title: Putin's Blindspots: Inside Russia with Susan Glasser
description: Susan Glasser, former editor of Politico, joins Chuck to talk about how relations with Russia got to where they are, what Putin hopes to get from the United States, and whether Russia is primed for a revolution. Glasser also discusses Buzzfeed's decision to release an unverified memo about the President-elect.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
